content.raw: Currently the JointPosition interface in ROS is using SetPosition (in default_robot_hw_sim.cpp) .It is problematic since PositionInterface freeze with gazebo 7. In our case, we want to use this to control a steering angle. Perhaps @chapulina have a good point, if the JointPositionInterface overwrite the simulation it will not respect the physics.( The joint position will directly match the joint command instead of reaching the position based on joint parameter.)
